## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Scope

List the impacted areas and confirm any explicitly non-impacted areas.

## Issue Link

- For feature/fix PRs (required): `Closes #<id>` or `Refs #<id>`
- For docs/chore PRs (optional): add link if relevant

## Checklist

- [ ] PR description explains user-visible and technical impact.
- [ ] Issue is linked when required by contribution policy.
- [ ] Tests were added or updated for behavioral changes.
- [ ] Documentation was added or updated for behavioral changes.
- [ ] CI is expected to pass.
- [ ] All review comments are addressed or discussed.
